About me


My name is Ali Akbar Eftekhari. My family and friends call me Ehsan. I currently live in Delft, the Netherlands with my wife, Maryam, and my daughter, Aida. I am a post-doc in the Section of Petroleum Engineering at the TU Delft.
I have a twitter account that is barely used, a Google scholar profile where you can see a list of my publications, and a github account where you can find some of my codes.
